nodes.text: The two parties should recognize the concerns of the other side
Marwan Jamil Muasher Minister of Foreign Affairs of Jordan said
There is a real mincing of words  at the moment Muasher said. As long as a reluctance to recognize the genuine concerns of the other sides exists peace will not come.
We are as close as we've ever been  to a solution but there still exists  the worst situation on the ground.

clear actions need to be taken by both sides. Arab leaders need to forcefully state that  suicide bombings are wrong from a moral and political point of view. Israel needs to clearly and unequivocally state that it will implement the road map in full  including a return to 1967 borders
